body_html:
@pjh5 Thanks for repying.

When am installing using FULL_CAFFE2=1 python setup.py install , I am getting the following error

Built target caffe2_pybind11_state
CMakeFiles/Makefile2:2104: recipe for target 'caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2_gpu.dir/all' failed
make[1]: *** [caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2_gpu.dir/all] Error 2
Makefile:140: recipe for target 'all' failed
make: *** [all] Error 2
Failed to run 'bash tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh --use-cuda --use-nnpack --full-caffe2 nccl caffe2 nanopb libshm gloo THD c10d'

body:
@pjh5  Thanks for repying.

When am installing using `FULL_CAFFE2=1 python setup.py install` , I am getting the following error


 Built target caffe2_pybind11_state
CMakeFiles/Makefile2:2104: recipe for target 'caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2_gpu.dir/all' failed
make[1]: *** [caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2_gpu.dir/all] Error 2
Makefile:140: recipe for target 'all' failed
make: *** [all] Error 2
Failed to run 'bash tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh --use-cuda --use-nnpack --full-caffe2 nccl caffe2 nanopb libshm gloo THD c10d'
